title: Riot Oceania serves in meltdown?
body:
Ok so i have s**t internet, not going to lie. But whatever you are doing to the servers Riot is causing me to have a steady 500 ping. Why are you changing it? You know the saying "if it aint broke dont fix it" i guess this kinda applies here. Fair enough if you are trying to make a better experience for us but honestly as an OCE player i feel neglected by Riot. I feel neglected because the communication to us players is really bad. For example, the server skin (It is incredible btw nice job on it) was a mess, the reef thing that you are going do, i have no idea what is going on with that and now this, this 'network shift'. I would of love to known about this before i hopped onto a game. 
Look i think what you do is amazing and i love your work as a video game studio, but please communicate with us and let us know things as they are going to happen, not when they do happen.
